title: Emerald Vaanki - Diamond and Emerald Gold Bangle
materials: Square-cut Emerald (AAA quality). Meticulously crafted with a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: A classic vaanki design reimagined. Features an intricately linked diamond-studded pattern leading to a centerpiece with a vibrant emerald. The geometric design showcases a perfect blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary elegance. Finished with a secure clasp for comfortable wear.
colors: with sparkling White Diamonds and a vibrant Green Emerald.
occasions: traditional festivals like Ugadi and Sankranti
or as a statement piece for special occasions. This Vaanki adds a touch of regal elegance to any attire.
description: This Vaanki is a testament to timeless elegance. The combination of brilliant diamonds and a rich green emerald makes it a truly captivating piece. Crafted with the utmost attention to detail and using only the finest materials, this bangle is designed to be cherished for generations. The Emerald adds a touch of auspiciousness, believed to bring prosperity and good health.
